name: Squishy Bugs - Tap the Bugs Kids Game
name_original: Squishy Bugs - Tap the Bugs Kids Game
description:
Squishy bugs is a highly entertaining family game for all ages, with the power of one-tap gameplay! Joyfully squish bugs and unlock all the levels or even get the highest score!

-------------------------------

Squishy Bugs features:

Easy and fun to play
Handdrawn graphics that will have you smashing for joy
Leaderboards and Achievements to watch your friends and competitors!
